I'm sorry.  The point is she's new and so is having more or less as 
much trouble as I did at first.  The fact that I'm doing better than 
her simply means I've improved with time.  She will too.  It wasn't 
intended as an insult.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Dewboy, its not right to go out and openly insult someone who has 
never 
> provoked you. I believe you owe Hottie4U an apology.
